intro: Loxanthera sternbergianus, commonly known as the desert daisy, is a flowering plant native to the arid regions of Australia. The plant has small, narrow leaves and is well adapted to survive in hot, dry environments. It is often found in sandy soils and is a hardy perennial that thrives in full sun. Loxanthera sternbergianus is valued for its ornamental appeal and its ability to stabilize soil in harsh landscapes.
